issue.title: [Java] Allow Travis CI failures for JDK9 for now
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1490](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1490). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These started failing recently. Rather than disabling the entry in the build matrix, I'm adding it to the allowed failures list so we can still see when/if the flakiness resolves (or we fix with some other patch)

cc `[~laurentgo]`
